alert.note: Alert for Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 17 at 1:43PM MDT until October 18 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 degrees possible. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, Far Northeast Highlands and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Though Raton, Las Vegas and Moriarty briefly dropped below freezing on October 13th, there is potential for a longer duration freeze late tonight.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Estancia Valley; Far Northeast Highlands; Northeast Highlands
